HYDOLOGY	Hydrology
HYDROLOGY	Hydrology
ROTHC	RothC
STORM_SEQUENCE	Storm sequence
STROM_SEQUENCE	Storm sequence
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SINGLE_STORM_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM	Day (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SINGLE_STORM_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SINGLE_STORM_SIM_DAY_NORMAL_PRECIP	Normal ppt. (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SINGLE_STORM_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_DAILY_RUNOFF_DEPTH	Runoff depth (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:DAYS_IN_YEAR)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_MONTHLY_RUNOFF_INDEX	Runoff index (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:MONTHS)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_OUTPUT_EVENT_RAINFALL_DEPTH	Base event rainfall depth (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_OUTPUT_EVENT_SIM_DAY)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_OUTPUT_EVENT_SIM_DAY	Date (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_OUTPUT_EVENT_SIM_DAY)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_YEARLY_SR_VAL	SR value (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_YEARS)
TABLE:#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_YEARS	Year (#RD:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR:SS_YEARS)
TABLE:#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM	Day (#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM)
TABLE:#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_NORMAL_EROSIVITY	Normal erosivity (#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM)
TABLE:#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_NORMAL_PRECIP	Normal ppt. (#RD:STORM_SEQ_SIM_DAY_PTR:STORM_SEQ_EROS_DAY_IN_SIM)
TABLE:MAN_DURATION	Duration (MAN_LAYER)
TABLE:SEG_INPUT_SEG_NUM	Input seg number (SEGMENT, NUM_INPUT_SEGS)
TABLE:SEG_MONTHLY_EVENT_RUNOFF	Storm seq. event runoff (MONTHLY_DATES, SEGMENT)
TABLE:SEG_RUNOFF_EVENT_RUNOFF_DEPTH	Seg base unadj event runoff depth (SLOPE_RUNOFF_EVENT_DATE, SEGMENT)
TABLE:SEG_SIM_DAY_CN	CN (DAY_IN_SIM, SEGMENT)
TABLE:SEG_SIM_DAY_ROTH_C_HUM	RothC HUM (DAY_IN_SIM, SEGMENT)
TABLE:SEG_YEARLY_PART_TYPE_MASS_P_WIDTH	Part. type mass / width (SEGMENT_BY_YEARLY_DATES, SED_PART_TYPE_NAMES)
TABLE:SEG_YEARLY_SED_CLASS_MASS_P_WIDTH	Sed. class mass / width (SEGMENT_BY_YEARLY_DATES, SLOPE_NUM_SED_CLASSES)
TABLE:SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR	Storm sequence calculations (SINGLE_STORM_EROSIVITY_PTR)
TABLE:SLOPE_MAN_IRRIG_SYSTEM_PTR	Irrigation system (MAN_LAYER)
